extra_field: This record has an extra field

name: Record with special characters: !@#$%^&*()_+-={}[]|\:;"'<>?,./
long_text: This is a very long text field that contains multiple sentences and should test how the system handles large text data. It includes various punctuation marks, numbers like 12345, and special characters like !@#$%^&*(). The purpose is to ensure that the data ingestion framework can handle diverse text content without issues.
